Introduction

Ueda Juria is a Japanese singer and dancer under XGALX. She was under Good Choice Entertainment in 2014–2015. She is best known as the main vocalist of the Japanese global girl group XG.

Born in Osaka, Japan, Juria was a former member of an idol group, amorecarina, until she graduated from the group on September 30, 2015. She was in the unit Juri♡Puri. After graduation, she went by the name Ueda Juria and became a special student at Avex Artist Academy Tokyo.

On February 3, 2022, Juria was revealed as the sixth member of XG The group officially debuted on March 18, 2022, with their debut digital single "Tippy Toes".
